forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds beneath a brilliant sun, casting a warm glow over the iconic cityscape. With temperatures hovering around a pleasant 59 degrees, the crisp air invigorates the senses, outlining a clear horizon that beckons for exploration. The absence of fog reveals the majestic contours of the Golden Gate Bridge and the high rises that define the skyline, standing tall against a backdrop of cerulean skies and wispy clouds that drift lazily. The gentle northwest wind, carrying a refreshing bite, enhances the day’s charm, whispering secrets of the bay and rustling the leaves of the nearby trees.

As evening approaches, clear skies will yield to a coolness, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable 46 degrees. Dressed in layers—perhaps a light sweater paired with a stylish jacket—one can comfortably stroll along the Embarcadero or find solace at a cozy café, sipping a warm beverage while the sun sets on the tranquil waters of the bay. After the bustle of the day, this evening offers an ideal moment to savor the quiet beauty of San Francisco as the city transitions into twilight, making for a genuinely pleasant experience in one of the most beloved urban landscapes.
